title: Chicago Spurs Typeface
content:
been trying to find a match or something close for a while...Flange, Coliseum?...any other ideas much appreciated?

Cheers  
Rob

author: Rob Sutton

comments.content:
This is hand-drawn. You won’t find anything much closer than the examples you’ve mentioned.

- Lex

Thanks for the reply, I was aware it was hand-drawn just hoping something would be a closer match..... it looks very familiar.

many thanks
